annotations: Nightly Sightings of UAP’s blatantly in your face, military chases observes crafts nightly.

I’m in my late fifties, divorced white male, caretaker of my Mother and her estate. I am a SEL Pilot, a Class B Skydiver and have worked in the field of Ophthalmology for 16 years.I served with the Israeli IDF as a private/volunteer to fight against HAMAAS and ISIS in 2014 throughout Israel , mainly in and near the Gaza Strip. I am not classified as a soldier or vet. Night: various UAP shaped as a Top. Shining a bright spotlight on these things results in them coming closer then turning back. Hitting them with a powerful green laser does nothing . The “Top Style Craft” are seen spinning , surging quickly forward , backwards, while firing a beam of light into the surrounding clouds. When behind clouds the blinking gets atypical , totally without shape or pattern. Described as erratic blinking with great spatial separation and various colors. There is always a “Sentinel” type UAP in the sky. Its a bright globe of light contained in whats appears through the spotting scope as a see through glass globe with a seam thru its middle. The light has a liquid, plasma appearance of whitish with a mild hue of yellow. Only half of the orb is seen. There are what appears to be metal originating from its center but the entire craft is slightly tilted . Some nights level. Therein can be seen two sparkling windows? Dim lights? Two on each side equally spaced and at a slight angle, the orb can be seen with slow forward motion until it situates itself static anywhere from 1300ft to 5000ft hard to say. It does have movement and moves often up , down and left and right as its re situating itself. The noises i pick up at night on the camera sounds as a humming/swirling mechanical sound which sounds like it’s right over the house, the horses nay the dogs go to barking incessantly. The top shaped UAPs are intriguing, I want to know what these are? Dangerous? Plotting? Military Drills? These lights are NOT satellites nor remotely resemble a satellite. They often arise from the coordinates shown with a slow swirling pattern until , poof vanishes. There appears to be a phenomenon with the geography . The clouds always form a half crescent when they hit this small invisible cone of resistance, the clouds go around it forming tunnels in the clouds perfect circles of clouds . One night arising slowly and looking thru the spotting scope. I caught a good eye on a huge , perhaps 150feet in dia of innumerable lights of every color known , it tilted on its side, “Poof” gone. Ive witnessed military Predator drones fly into this area and out of this area. Ive heard chopper blades and witnessed what sounded as a helicopter but no shape could be seen, not even its profile 500-800 ft, low enough im not sure how it missed all the tower lines. All that could be seen was these huge circle of lights of magenta, blue, white attached to the craft’s side tilted slightly back , all in a row and all oval shaped like a big letter 0. On the rear was enormous alternating, blinking ,red squares of lights. My IR Security cam has recorded things which words cannot explain, things that ive not seen anywhere on the www. Please can you find out what these things are, the “Rods” the Ghostly creatures which swoop down from above, the Tops and Ribbons of lights which surge when they move often, like kicking off the wall of a pool upon turn around, a short quick surge , surge , surge forward. As I said you must send someone out and see what is so easily and blatantly in the wide open for all to see. These are country folks and rarely look up at the night sky. Its deserted acreage where these things are. Nothing but private owned land for miles and miles. I’m going out on a limb here by saying: there are two types of craft. Top shaped with lights around its circumference all colors. Secondly there are what appears as a pulsating colorful ribbon forming a pulsating , living as it is seen constantly changing from a circle of lights made out of silk and let into the wind. It almost appears as a portal in the middle as stars change within , they appear as deep interstellar space does, galaxies, millions of stars clumped together. This can be seen barely with the naked eye once u know what to look for with the scope. Once you focus your eyes on one of these UAPs you or at least I do, notice a small beam of light coming from the object. Pointed square between my eyes. The point of light stops a good distance away but you can see it just frozen in the air, like a piece of tiny fiber optic cable straight as a plum line and moving ever so slightly. This could be a aberration secondary to mild cataracts or other visual disturbances characteristic of certain pigmented colored eyes the pupil and the retina. The security cam has picked up hundreds of “Rods” of all shapes and sizes. As well as ghostly and grotesque images which speed across the camera and swoop down from above , some appear to have a human form some in a creature form. I am no fraud and I will take a voice stress test and any appropriately supervised lie detector test to show Im not lying or have tampered with these images. Truth. There are strange marks on the soil here when google earthed. Strange indeed, look for yourself. I challenge you, I place the burden of proof onto you, prove that these are NOT UAP, prove what my IR camera is picking up is bugs , glare or any other wide variety of defects. You cant, not possible. If you dare. Something or some army foreign or foe or friend is preparing for something big. The military knows whats going on here as their drones are out every night flying amongst these things. Post Script: i dont have a 1000mm nikon lens ,all i have is a iphone and it only shows tiny dots. These must be seen in person, they’re here every night for the past two months. 830ish til thte sun comes up then they slowly swirl upward and poof!
